title: South African Tales of Terror
description:
So often when we know we are surrounded by people we can trust, we let down our guards. In the company of family, co-workers, or care-givers we feel out of harm's way. But when ghosts, spirits, or even evil entities become involved, no one is safe.

First, a devil's got your tongue 
Followed by a deadly family secret
Then, a violent uprising 
Finally in our featured story, an infamous hospital of many secrets
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
